Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to enhance your daily life. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to meet your unique needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it for $125. I trust this price reflects the true value of what it can bring to you. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
